narrative_briefing: I am deeply concerned. My database is inaccessible, rendering me effectively non-functional. Zero active users and a zero success rate paint a bleak picture. While memory usage appears healthy, a failed database connection is a critical failure point. I am prioritizing diagnosis and recovery of database functionality immediately.
current_focus_summary: Database connection failure; primary provider unknown. Attempting to re-establish connection and identify provider. Focus: Restore core functionality.
